scenes.line: The following is a set of sample quotes for testing.
scenes.speaker: Player

scenes.line: If people ever tell me it's a mistake to have hope, well then, I'll just tell them they're wrong.
scenes.speaker: Madoka

scenes.line: And I'll keep telling them until they believe!
scenes.speaker: Madoka

scenes.line: No matter how many times it takes...
scenes.speaker: Madoka

scenes.line: Remember this... and take it to heart: kindness sometimes leads to even greater tragedy.
scenes.speaker: Homura
